title: ward skin gone?
body:
I was changing my ward skins and I was trying to find my old ward skin. It was just gone, POOF not even there. I bought it when all the special little wards were on the shop, penguin skier,  ward, etc. Now I don't even have my favorite one. If someone could help me get it back or maybe this is an issue on my end, please help.

I looked through my purchase history and it only goes back 3 months so I couldn't find when I bought it and I don't know if there is an option to see your full purchase history. Thanks to anyone who can help.

replies.body: Unfortunately, I wasn't able to locate this content if it's the account you're posting from.  Reach out to us in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) and our billing team can take a look and see what's going on.  They'll give more context and respond to you asap!
